name: superpower
effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Attack and Defense by one stage each.
short_effect: Lowers the user’s Attack and Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Boosts strength sharply, but lowers abilities.
flavor_text.emerald: Boosts strength sharply, but lowers abilities.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: A powerful attack, but it also lowers the user’s ATTACK and DEFENSE stats.
